Spansion:EvasiveManeuvers.NAME: Evasive Maneuvers
Spansion:EvasiveManeuvers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  If this card is discarded, gain !M! Dexterity.

Spansion:FancyFootwork.NAME: Fancy Footwork
Spansion:FancyFootwork.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intend to attack, gain !B! Block.  Otherwise draw !M! Card(s).

Spansion:FeintAttack.NAME: Feint Attack
Spansion:FeintAttack.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card.  Deal !D! damage to target enemy and gain !B! block this turn.  Gain !B! block next turn.

Spansion:OldOneTwo.NAME: The Ol' One-Two
Spansion:OldOneTwo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage twice, applying !M! vulnerable after each hit.
